extension.description: Mednafen is a portable multi-system emulator. This is port of the Mednafen PSX core to the libretro API.[CR][CR]PlayStation 1 emulation is currently in a buggy alpha state and not all hardware and features are emulated. A dual-core Phenom II or Athlon II at 3GHz or higher, or rough equivalent, is recommended for running Mednafen's PlayStation 1 emulation. PSF1 playback is supported.[CR][CR]Source: https://github.com/libretro/mednafen-libretro
